column7: company_profile

Uber Technologies is a transportation technology firm. The company's remit includes ride-hailing, food delivery, and freight transportation. Uber Technologies was established in 2009 and is based in San Francisco, California, US.

Mobisol develops and installs solar home systems that provide electricity to power LED lights, radios, mobile phones, and various household and consumer appliances. Its solar home systems include LED light bulbs, portable lanterns, and mobile phone chargers, as well as balance-of-system components, such as wiring and switches. The company was established in 2010 and is based in Berlin, Germany.
Citigroup is a diversified financial services company. Citigroup was founded in 1812 and is headquartered in NYC, New York, US.

Serba Dinamik Holdings is a provider of engineering solutions to the oil and gas and power generation industries, with operational facilities in Malaysia, Indonesia, UAE, Bahrain and the UK. It is based in Selangor, Malaysia.

Botswana-based Choppies, an investment holding company, owns and operates a chain of supermarkets in sub-Saharan Africa. The company operates value stores, superstores, and hyperstores under the Choppies brand name. Its stores offer products, including fruits and vegetables, bakery, butchery, takeaway, kiosk, bulk buys, frozen foods, cold drinks, dairy and general merchandise. In addition, the company distributes meat. Choppies was founded in 1986 and is based in Gaborone, Botswana.

Neusoft provides IT solutions and services worldwide. The company offers products and platforms, such as TalentBase human capital management system; SkillBase, an e-learning system; group financial management and control system; customer relationship management system; enterprise asset management system; super electronic archive system; business process content management platform; and UniOffice, an office management system. Its products and platforms also include picture archiving and communication software system; digital signage network/system; NetEye security operations centre platform; NetPatrol, a network application monitoring and management system; Aclome, a cloud management environment; UniEAP, a unified enterprise application practice application; OpenBASE, a database management system; mobile device management system; navigation system; and rear view assistance system. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Shenyang, China.

Banque Misr provides a range of banking services. It offers current accounts, current accounts in foreign currencies, savings accounts, saving pools, mutual funds, interest rates on foreign deposits, letters of credit, documentary credit and social development funds, as well as Islamic banking services. The bank's loan products include consumer loans, salary loans, educational loans and loans guaranteed by mutual funds certificates. Banque Misr provides various insurance products, such as accidental insurance, personal insurance, liability insurance and life insurance. It also offers Internet banking, automated teller machine services and interactive voice services. In addition, the bank invests in various projects, including financial, industrial, tourism, food, housing, service and communication and information technology. Founded in 1920, Banque Misr is headquartered in Cairo, Egypt.

SEW-Eurodrive engages in the development, production, and sale of drive technology. It offers gear motors and inverter technology, industrial gear units, decentralised drives and mechatronics, servo drive technology, and energy-saving solutions, as well as industrial communication solutions, control technology, operator panels, software, and other accessories. The company also offers engineering and selection, and startup and maintenance services. It serves automotive transportation and logistics, beverage, airport baggage handling, and other industries worldwide. SEW-Eurodrive was founded in 1931 and is based in Bruchsal, Germany.

column7: Apelby Communications provides telecommunication services. The company's remit includes international voice traffic services, data and SMS, outsourcing services for retail customers, and fraud and market protection services. Apelby Communications was founded in 2005 and is based in Dusseldorf, Germany.

Bharti Airtel, together with its subsidiaries, provides telecommunication systems and services worldwide. Its Mobile Services India segment offers voice and data telecom services.  The company's Telemedia Services segment provides voice and data communications based on fixed network and broadband technology. Its Tower Infrastructure Services segment engages in setting up, operating, and maintaining wireless communication towers. The company was formerly known as Bharti Tele-Ventures Limited and changed its name to Bharti Airtel Limited in April 2006. Bharti Airtel Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.

Sika is a speciality chemical company which develops and manufactures products for the construction industry. The company focuses on the production of systems and products for bonding, sealing, damping, reinforcing and protecting in the building and the motor vehicle industries. The company was established in 1910 and is headquartered in Baar, Switzerland.
column37: "By establishing a new concrete admixtures and mortar production plant in the metropolis of Dar es Salaam, we are gaining an early foothold as a local producer in this growth market," said Paul Schuler, regional manager (EMEA). Forecasts indicate that the Tanzanian construction sector is set to grow by just under 7% in 2017 and by 8% a year in the period up to 2025.

column7: Bharti Airtel, together with its subsidiaries, provides telecommunication systems and services worldwide. Its Mobile Services India segment offers voice and data telecom services.  The company's Telemedia Services segment provides voice and data communications based on fixed network and broadband technology. Its Tower Infrastructure Services segment engages in setting up, operating, and maintaining wireless communication towers. The company was formerly known as Bharti Tele-Ventures Limited and changed its name to Bharti Airtel Limited in April 2006. Bharti Airtel Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.

Meta provides social networking and communications products. Its social media platforms include Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, and WhatsApp. The firm also offers Oculus virtual reality hardware and operates data centres. The company was established in 2004 and is headquartered in Menlo Park, California, US. On 28 October 2021, the company announced the rebranding of its corporate name from Facebook to Meta.

Guaranty Trust Bank provides various retail, corporate, and commercial banking services. It offers current accounts, savings deposits, time deposits, call accounts, domiciliary accounts, and fixed/tenured deposits. The company also provides private banking services, investment savings products, custody, credit and debit cards, customer loans, mortgages, direct debit facilities, overdrafts, loans and other credit facilities, foreign currency, and derivative products. Guaranty Trust Bank was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

China National Materials engages in cement and other non-metal materials manufacturing, non-metal materials technological equipping and engineering, and non-metal mining industries. The is company involved in the research, development, production, and sale of glass fibre, composite materials, artificial crystals, industrial ceramics and related products, concrete, and new wall materials; and exploration, design, technology development, equipment manufacturing, engineering, and general contracting of non-metal materials and glass, and building ceramics production lines. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Beijing, China.
column38: Tanzania and wider continent including Somalia, Kenya, Mozambique, Sudan, the Democratic Republic of Congo and Uganda.

column7: Mondo Ride provides a ride-hailing platform. The application connects passengers with nearby drivers and is designed to provide ride-hailing services within a short amount of time, as well as, guaranteeing safety and comfort for the passenger. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

ARM Cement manufactures and sells cement in Kenya, Tanzania, South Africa, and Rwanda. It operates through Cement and Lime, and Other Products segments. The company is also involved in the mining and processing of industrial minerals and chemicals; trade of other building products; extraction and processing of limestone; and manufacture and sale of fertilisers and silicate liquid.  The company was formerly known as Athi River Mining and changed its name in July 2012. ARM Cement Limited was founded in 1974 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

Viettel provides telecommunications services in Vietnam and internationally. Its services include mobile telecommunications, Internet, related media and technology services. Viettel is headquartered in Ha Noi, Vietnam, and was founded in 2004.

Podravka operates as a diversified food and beverage company. The firm functions through several segments including food, beverages and pharmaceuticals. It was established in 1934 and is headquartered in Koprivnica, Croatia.

column7: Kenya-based Equity Bank, together with its subsidiaries, primarily offers retail banking and microfinance services. Its personal banking products include current, equity ordinary, super junior investment and call and fixed deposit accounts. The company also offers business banking products and services comprising equity business and current accounts; business and development loans, agricultural loans, working capital loans, educational loans, medical loans, and salary advances. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Nairobi, Kenya.

Bharti Airtel, together with its subsidiaries, provides telecommunication systems and services worldwide. Its Mobile Services India segment offers voice and data telecom services.  The company's Telemedia Services segment provides voice and data communications based on fixed network and broadband technology. Its Tower Infrastructure Services segment engages in setting up, operating, and maintaining wireless communication towers. The company was formerly known as Bharti Tele-Ventures Limited and changed its name to Bharti Airtel Limited in April 2006. Bharti Airtel Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.

Its Tower Infrastructure Services segment engages in setting up, operating, and maintaining wireless communication towers. The company was formerly known as Bharti Tele-Ventures Limited and changed its name to Bharti Airtel Limited in April 2006. Bharti Airtel Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.

Dazeworks is a Salesforce consulting company. Its areas of expertise include Force.com services such as app development, integration with Salesforce.com and migration to Force.com as well as Salesforce.com services such as set-up, dedicated administrators, customisation, data, integration and support services. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Pallippuram, India.
